entries: You dedicated yourself to intense training and rigorous study to become a great warrior. The school you attended might have been a traditionalist monastery, an elite military academy, or the local branch of a prestigious mercenary organization.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in your choice of the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill. You gain a skill feat: {@feat Cat Fall} if you chose {@skill Acrobatics} or {@feat Quick Jump} if you chose {@skill Athletics}. You're also trained in the {@skill Lore||Warfare Lore} skill.
